text: the thing about broccoli is that it has
a really strong flavor and it needs a
strong sauce to stand up to it
a Spanish romesco can hold its own a
traditional romesco is an incredibly
versatile sauce in Spain they usually
make it with peppers always garlic
sometimes tomatoes maybe some
breadcrumbs and nuts to give it a nice
texture and then you can really use it
anywhere it's terrific on fish you could
use it with steak and it's absolutely
brilliant on broccoli you want the
peppers to be really black like this and
the garlic and the tomatoes don't need

and you're gonna want to clear the air
here I have some toasted peeled
hazelnuts you could really use almonds

hazelnuts have the sweetest most
interesting flavor and I'm just gonna
grind them up
